column5: We are conveniently located on the edge of West Plano, right off of the Dallas North Tollway and George Bush Tollway. It's only a short drive to West Plano, Addison, Frisco, and Uptown Dallas. You will be able to stay in our very spacious master bedroom, with your own private bathroom. Please feel free to make yourself at home anywhere in the living room and kitchen as well. People of all backgrounds are welcome.
